trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage"></xref> interface to create a message that responds to a call to instantiate a remote object.

A <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ConstructionResponse> object returns the result of a construction request sent with the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage> interface.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ConstructionResponse> class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.

You do not need to create an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ConstructionResponse> class directly; instead, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage> interface.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ConstructionResponse"></xref> class from an array of remoting headers and a request message.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ConstructionResponse> class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.

You do not need to create an instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ConstructionResponse> class directly; instead, use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage> interface.
An array of remoting headers that contain key-value pairs.

This array is used to initialize <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ConstructionResponse"></xref> fields for those headers that belong to the namespace "http://schemas.microsoft.com/clr/soap/messageProperties".
A request message that constitutes a constructor call on a remote object.
Gets an <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> interface that represents a collection of the remoting message's properties.

The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.ConstructionResponse.Properties%2A> property returns the value of the inherited <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodResponse.ExternalProperties> field.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> interface that represents a collection of the remoting message's properties.
